ygData.subject: Re: [The EverQuest Tavern] Greetings All :)
ygData.msgSnippet: Hmmi would say first to go to www.eqdruids.com if you dont already know about it. It is a terrific druid only site. In the messages boards they have sticky
ygData.messageBody:
Hmmi would say first to go to www.eqdruids.com if you dont already
know about it. It is a terrific druid only site. In the messages
boards they have sticky post about where to hunt at your general lvl.
Not for sure but at 41 i think i was quadding snow cougers in ice
clad or maybe the specs in oasis. After them i went to timoruos deep
and started quadding spirocs. That took me to all the way to 51 xp
slows down at about 50 51 on the spirocs but i know can take you to
52 as i am about to ding it there. Or you can start trying the
raptors in that same zone also. I havent tried them yet but read that
it can be done. If you want to make some money and xp head to cobalt
scar and quad the wyverns. Save the pelts and sell them in bazaar and
sell the gems to vendors for about 40plat. This is a bit more
dangerous and harder as there is always people there farming. Unless
you have killed alot of giants in velious and raised your claws of
veeshan
faction you will be kos to the drakes there and they cast on you for
like 300 dam. Do not pull the named wyvern he cannot be slowed or
snared. As far as the wis items i just went to bazaar and filled in
the filters one of them you can pick wis and all wis items will come
up then just shop away. It will be slow quadding till you get your
new aoe spell lightnig blast and lvl 45 when you can get kei then its
smooth sailing to 51. Oh there is a good quest wis book you can hold
in your off hand adss like 10 wis and somethin other would be easy to
obtain at you lvl. Sorry but i forgot the name of it next time im on
ill check but can prolly find it on the druid site.
--- In theeverquesttavern@yahoogroups.com, Sue <kstiggermom@y...>
wrote:
> ** sigh **
>
> I guess I'm the loner. I'm on Drinal & Luclin.
>
> My main is a 41 druid named Charai accompanied by a warrior named
Athynna, bard named Jovvi, monk named Whyyte Lhyyte(hehehe), pally
named Minniey & a chanter named Tymthyn Jhntr (sound it out - think
Monte Python).
>
> Anyone got suggestions for zones for the druid. Currently camping
ruins in Dreadlands, but it is getting slow going xp wise (though
cash loot is rather profitable)
>
> Also, need some ideas for wisdom gear. Charai was 1st character & I
made some serious errors setting her up. So looking for some nice
mana & wisdom gear. Especially since I am starting on my epic soon ;)
>
> Laters
>
> Charai
>
>
> Sue
>
> Just me
> No cute, sappy quotes
> No wise words of wisdom
>
